sites.name: Red Fort
sites.description: Historic fort in Delhi that served as the Mughal emperors' residence.

sites.name: Qutub Minar
sites.description: A 73-meter tall tower built in 1193 by Qutb-ud-din Aibak.

sites.name: Brihadeeswara Temple
sites.description: Built by Raja Raja Chola I in Thanjavur.
